content.detailedDescription: For the past two weeks my wife and i have seen ufos flying around in different directions different speeds different heights i seen a couple helicopters chaseing one but we tried to film on phones and our cams go black
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: For past 2 weeks every nite sites

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were on our deck when we observed a round pulsating very bright orange light. at first we thought it may be a plane on fire as the color appeared more flame-like than traditional plane lights. we did observe what appeared to be pulsating red lights behind the main orange light. the object was traveling north rather slowly.  when above our house it made an abrupt right turn.  as it was heading west, into cloud cover, we lost sight of the object.  my husband who is well-educated in aeronautics estimated it was traveling at an altitude of 20,000 feet at about 500-600 mph.  the turn made was abrupt and not typical of a normal commercial airliner, and was more the type of turn you would witness from a military jet.  we live on the flight path of both an international and a county airport, and are very familiar with seeing planes in the sky over our home.  this was not a plane. approximately 10 minutes before our  , we did hear a helicopter in the sky over our neighborhood.  we cannot be sure this is connected, as we often hear helicopters taking off from the nearby airport.
content.summary: Observed a round pulsating very bright red orange light.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed the ufo in the picture after i came home and looked through my photos. i didn't notice anything at all while taking the picture.
content.summary: I found the ufo in the picture after i came home and looked through my photos. i didn't notice anything at all while taking the picture.

content.detailedDescription:
Mother and i both saw this as it flew over a field on south salem road.We first noticed it while heading east on york lane off to the north or to the skies on our left. as it was at this point was just a spot light floating in the sky and appeared to be slowly turning east as it was facing south at first sight. i do not put much stock in lights in the sky so i wrote it off as a helicopter using a spotlight. then we turned north off york lane onto south salem. when we passed a red brick house on the left . i saw a triangle shaped craft between 50 and 75 feet off the ground.At first glance i could not make sense of what i was looking at. then it looked to change shape,a second later as we were at this point directly under it. i screamed at mother to stop the car so i could get i-phone footage of it. but she was terrified and looked at it once but refused to take a second look. and even sped up to avoid it. i stuck my head out the window and watched it roll upward with no forward momentum. then it stopped and i could see it plain as day as there was a 3/4 moon directly behind it. there were a line of cars behind us. so someone else   
had to have seen it. i can only hope others saw it and will report what they saw to provide validity to what we witnessed. last i saw of it it was heading toward the west on a path that i am certain would have taken it directly over
novella arkansas which is on the west side of the river www of our position at that time. i believe i lost some time. please note the craft moved off at a slow steady rate of approximately 20 mph. until it was just a light in the distance. i pleaded with mother to chase after it. it's behaviour made me feel they were looking for a secluded place to land perhaps for repairs.I would like someone to go with me to try and find a landing spot somewhere close to the river as they often land near large water sources and i think i know exactly where they put down at. all mufon investigators please contact me so we can set up an expedient expedition asap. i am a skilled artist and would be happy to draw up exactly what i and mother saw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Thick triangle, black top black triangle bottom, with golden glowing metalic sides that were grooved

content.detailedDescription: Found these pictures and video on my game camera. perhaps someone can explain what it might be or what caused it. photo of 9/30/2013 at 11:27.16 is a daylight photo of the area that same day. photos of 9/30/2013 starting at 19:09.31 through 19:09.32 are still photos, three total and then a minute of video which starts at 19:09.37.
content.summary: Found these pictures and video on my game camera that i use as a security camera at the entrance to my camp.

content.detailedDescription: Let my dogs out around 8:30 pm on oct. 11,2013, in backyard to potty. when out of the corner of my eye, i saw a big, bright reddish orange pulsating orb slowly moving north. i watched it for about 4 min.  in awe. then, ran in the house to get my husband. but, by the time he came out, it was gone. it was low, big and looked like a ball of plasma. a mini sun. way cool. did not have camera with me. sure, did not expect to see that.
content.summary: Saw slo moving glowing reddish orange large orb in backyard moving from the south, going north.

content.detailedDescription: On the 12th day of october 2013, at about 13:00hrs est, i witnessed a disc like object flying from north east over the village of owego, new york.  object omitted no sound, there was no ���trail��� after  it there was no visible wings of any kind.  a short 22 second video taken on a camera phone was shot.   the disc moved from south west to the north east over the western horizon.     shortly after another object same size and shape, no wings, no trail, no sound was observed flying from east (binghamton, ny ) to the north west, however higher in the sky than the first object.  having observed thousands of flights going over this area in the last 30 years, i have never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: 2 discs over owego, new york, usa

content.detailedDescription: My family and i had just finished dinner outside (on the patio) and my son and i stayed to watch the sky. we both caught sight of a oval-sphere object overhead in the sky. which was somewhat low in the sky. don't know exact feet. at first we thought it was a plane, however, it began to move in sharp turns, circular, up, then down, so we quickly rejected this, since planes don't move in these odd directions. then it disappeared.
content.summary: It was a brght white flying oval-sphere shape that appeared in the night sky. it moved in atrange patterns, not in a straight line. then it disappeared. it lasted 2 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: i was driving down i 70 going home after work when at first i seen what i was guessing was a airplane a lot of them were flying that day. and then it was gone for a few sec was thinking it went behide a cloud  then after that it was back lower in the sky and it was very sliver and round  so i was thinking it could have been a weather balloon with something on it. and it just keep getting lower and i could see that it was very round like a big pea and looked like it had helicopter feet. watched it for a few sec thinking ok its nothing odd and then it just went away and never seen it after that .
content.summary: Was comeing home form working driving on i 70 and seen a very sliver round thing flying .

content.detailedDescription: In suburban darkened 6 block area, clear night sky, major typical  star objects were very visible overhead. about 12:18am, a very thin (about average small star width against sky), white bluish very straight light streak traveled high speed about 3-6 degrees across sky 90 degrees straight up over head and went out in a small flash. very high in altitude. very, very mechanical in shape and action. the light streak was very mechanically straight. not natural in appearance. no light brightness gradations, no wavey or curved action, no particles falling away, no trails left. very blunt, straight, very mechanical streak of light that ended in flash of light of same color then disappeared. very different from, fireball, meteor, shooting star which have gradations of brightness & direction and speed. this was very mechanically produced. frightening to watch because of it's untaural-none fireball or meteor appearance.
content.summary: Very thin, white bluish, short line of streaked light shot across sky ending with flash

content.detailedDescription: We were on the way home from a grocery store at sunset and noticed a very large bright star-like object hovering in the sky. a plane passed above it and the star-like object was under the advancing cloud cover. as we decided to drive west towards it on the highway, we witnessed it quickly flicker and diminish in its light intensity but noticed a dark spherical object in its place before it disappeared. upon arriving home, it reappeared with the same light intensity with what seemed from the naked eye like a red light at the bottom of the bright object below cloud cover. it did not move and was not a plane but would dim then gain brightness. the cell phone pictures are of poor quality. of note, there were several sightings the evening previous (several witnesses) over lake ontario of bright orange/red objects in the sky bouncing around and disappearing to reappear with blue contrails that disappeared with the objects. this area has also had sightings of a bright green orb in the southwest two weeks ago that appears and moves at 90 degree angles within seconds then disappears.
content.summary: Bright starlike object under cloud cover and under plane path, disappeared momentarily to reappear in same spot

content.detailedDescription: Got home from work about 7:45 and brought the dog out to walk it. i noticed a light that resembled a planet (as it was brighter than a star) and looked away. i then saw what appeared to be a shooting star that emitted a bright light and i looked up again and saw that the object was moving in a circular pattern. that when i ran inside and grabbed my phone to film it. i followed the object with my camera for about 16 seconds before it completely disappeared in a blink. we are in an area with heavy air traffic all hour of the day so it's not unusual for see several planes in the air at once. this was no plane.
content.summary: Glowing ball of light that varied in color.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from murray ky to bowling green to visit the family. i was jamming out to a soundtrack i had on my iphone when i happened to look up on my lefthand side. i didn't look to see if anyone was behind me but i started slamming on the brakes slowly just so i could catch a glimpse at just how beautiful it was. i saw what appeared to be a large airplane but with a bright turquoise underbelly that was domelike in the front and got smaller near the rear but didn't come to a full point. the wings were short and had some turquoise on them as well as red lights on each end. it was radiating these colors almost like it was a thermo plane. i automatically questioned whether the black suv/tahoe in front of me saw it or if i was just seeing things myself. i believe that's why i slowed down and looked over several times. i kept telling myself nu uh.. theres no way.. but it was there every time i looked over. i was just entering hopkinsville and i remember that because i wanted to remember a landmark so that i could be aware of anything in the news that was happening that might make this make more sense. the little green sign on the right hand side of the road said hopkinsville and the closest building nearby was a church building so i used it as a reference point. the unidentified object was seen on the west hand side of the church building in an open field. i also just thought that it might have been the a thermo plane that picks up heat that the gov.Would use to search for illegal crops or for someone who was on the run from the cops. but then again flying objects have codes to adhere to and these bright lights do not fall into code. i honestly wish i had stopped but being i'm a 24 year old female and was alone made things seem a little eery so i didn't. don't know if i'll see it again but i kind of hope so, it was so beautiful and i wasn't really afraid of it. more like mesmerized. if anyone sees anything just report it, we all need to know.
content.summary: The brightest  thing i've ever seen in the sky besides fireworks

content.detailedDescription: Ufo flight of 8 vanshing falling each other and it is not a joke
content.summary: Less

content.detailedDescription: I went out on the porch to check on the cat and when i looked up saw two red light coming from the north west  they were steady coming at me in a straight line. when they got closer they were two of them one was further than the other  there was no sound. at first i thought balloons but i heard no sound no flames they were a solid lights they moved over the complex and i went out side to follow and they both headed south east the out of sight the red lights faded
content.summary: Two red lights coming from the nrth west going over the apt complex

content.detailedDescription:
Sleepings rain in night   rain sapces was pin asernter abduction  worme  holes  bings abduction alien  ufo landings verrest 
 bings sightings landings rain attank aaa attank the rain
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: On sightings rain freoseter  over sightings

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving work with my co-worker and his wife at about 6:05, and we were stargazing before leaving because the sky was so clear.  we noticed an object that was roughly as large as saturn, as saturn was out for us to compare it, but it was blueish white and it started in a stationary position near the little dipper then started quickly traveling north east.  at first we thought it might be a satellite but it started making rapid turns and getting brighter.  when it stopped moving and paused for a short time, then darted away in a rapid sharp angle turn.  
then roughly 1 minute later in the same area of sky that the first object darted away to, a second object appeared, this one was roughly the same red color as mars, but it was much brighter and a bit larger.  this object moved to the east in a raped curving s turn then also halted for roughly 20 seconds and rapidly darted away in the same direction the first object vanished to.  
we thought they might be satellites at first, but i've seen the i.S.S. fly over and several other satellites and these were far brighter, moved far faster, were much larger, and turned and darted far faster than any satellite i've ever seen!  finally, after the red object vanished, there was a large white streak that was roughly as wide as a cigarette, and at it's speed left a large streak about (to our eyes) 3 inches end to end.  what made us question if it was a meteor was that it was going in the same direction that the first two objects vanished to and the streak didn't dissipate like the tail of a shooting star would, rather it stayed solid and all vanished at once.  almost looking like a ship jumping to warp speed on start trek.  now, had we only saw one of these object i wouldn't question what we saw.  but given that there were three in such close proximity, all going in the same direction, it made us all question what we were seeing.  seeing these objects made all three of us elated, and extremely alert.  as though we had just drank a gallon of coffee, and we work third shift and were all talking about how tired we were no more than 5 minutes prior to witnessing this.  it was almost like these object overhead revitalized us!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright white-blue upjet flew fast turning path, then flew off.  then red object did same. then large white streak across sky

content.detailedDescription:
Travelling at night in a coach when i noticed a star that seemed to be dancing. i thought it may have been because of the window glass vibrating so i stood up and opened the sliding section above so i could see it without looking through glass. i told others on the bus and we all watched it ascend and descend and move at angles to the north and south. it just looked like a star but it moved very fast in a zigzag fashion for up to five minutes as we traversed the large wide open valley. it then dropped at high speed at around 45 degrees to the south east and disappeared behind the outline of a series of hills. moments later there was a bright flash which outlined the hills from behind.
everyone on the bus witnessed it and all discussed what it may have been throughout the rest of our journey. all we could agree on was that it was was a ufo. after all was said and done this was the most discussed and thought of event of that days excursion.
content.summary: Travelling by bus south through large open valley when bright light seen darting erratically. then it darted at speed behind hill and a flash illuminated the hill outline against a dark sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Travelling at night in a coach when i noticed a star that seemed to be dancing. i thought it may have been because of the window glass vibrating so i stood up and opened the sliding section above so i could see it without looking through glass. i told others on the bus and we all watched it ascend and descend and move at angles to the north and south. it just looked like a star but it moved very fast in a zigzag fashion for up to five minutes as we traversed the large wide open valley. it then dropped at high speed at around 45 degrees to the south east and disappeared behind the outline of a series of hills. moments later there was a bright flash which outlined the hills from behind.
everyone on the bus witnessed it and all discussed what it may have been throughout the rest of our journey. all we could agree on was that it was was a ufo. after all was said and done this was the most discussed and thought of event of that days excursion.
content.summary: Travelling by bus south through large open valley when bright light seen darting erratically. then it darted at speed behind hill and a flash illuminated the hill outline against a dark sky.

content.detailedDescription:
A fiend, my engineering manager at the time, and i were flying electric powered rc aircraft at cedar creek park/mon valley rc airfield that evening.

around 7:00 pm i noticed an extremely bright "star" in the northwest sky. my wife was also with us and we took turns looking at the object for around forty minutes.  we sighted the object along our frequency pin board and it appeared to be stationary and in synchronous orbit.

the reason i noticed it was that stars do not show in the pennsylvania skies at 7:00 pm in july.  the object appeared to be a white ring with a dark center.  in addition there were curly lines  descending from either side of the object, that put my in mind of jewish dreadlocks.  i don't know how else to describe what we saw.  all of us agreed with my description.

after about 40 minutes, i happened to be looking through the binoculars, when the object appeared to explode and hundreds of white "shards" shot out of the object at about 280 degrees, and disappeared.  in place of the object was a red disk about half the size of the original object.  it held for about a three count, dropped straight down, the distance of about four diameters of the red disk, split in two, again about four diameters of the red disk, paused for a three count and then totally disappeared.  i have described the objects in relative diameters of the object, as i have no way of accurately relating size.

i later noted in the news that one of the galaxy satellites (i think g4) went off-line, never to function again, 24 hours after our siting.  we have wondered if what we'd seen was a test of an anti-satellite weapon.

note:  the above date is an estimate, as it was a long time ago.  i would really like to know what we saw, as my friend and i are both electrical engineers (ret) and have based our lives on facts and science.  if you have any ideas as to what it might have been, i'd sure like to know.  thanks! g. wilson
content.summary: High altitude "doughnut", exploded, broke in two, emitted "shards"

content.detailedDescription: I had gone to clinton, ok. for parts was driving west on us highway 40 between elk city, ok. and sayer, ok., when i was a couple of miles west of elk city i noticed what i thought was a helicopter checking the pipeline of in the distance a very bright beam came from the bottom of the craft(helicopter) not at all uncommon in our industry, it then descended behind a hill. i continued on my way west and at times would see the object in the distance first to the east then after a time to the west i really wasnt concerned as this is common in the oil and gas industry dealing with pipelines, but i became concerned when i noticed it approaching us ( my pickup and 5 tractor-trailer trucks ) we all slowed a bit but still found nothing strange about this situation almost immediately it was upon us and following us sideways as we proceeded west on the highway, by now all i could see was two of the very bright very white illuminating lights from the lower section of the airframe, the lights were so bright it illuminated the forward section of the airframe, it occurred to me that the skin of the craft was a dull white-cream-grey organic looking patterned ( as in swirled raised featured designs ) brightly lit, this was not aircraft skin, i've worked on aircraft. this was so very close to me and i began to get a bit concerned, and quite angry it followed us sideways for approximately 2 to 3 miles where i turned off to drive north and lost site of the craft. im a professional scientist and a total skeptic this infuriated me, later my wife whom i had called as i exited the highway and drove north told me i was enraged and she couldn't understand why, my question is why there were no reports of this encounter and why i was involved as i am still quite uncomfortable about all of this.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangular or boomerang, with (3) three bright lights, but a darkened upper structure

content.detailedDescription: while driving thru the town of abington they noticed these lights in the sky.  they were all traveling in formation toward the city of boston.  at the beginning of the video you see two of the objects in the sky,  then you see another object shoot across the screen extremely fast heading in an upward direction.  as he drove thru the center of town he stopped at the next light and there were 5 of them flying in formation, after leaving the light he saw two more farther down the street flying together,  i have a program that breaks down video into 30ths of a second,  the one that flew across the screen traveled the distance in 19/30 of a second.  the frontage of the buildings was approximately 88 feet and the video was taken approx. 40 feet from the curbing.  file number 5 below is showing the speeding object at 1/30th of a second..
content.summary: Driving thru abington

content.detailedDescription: The day was tuesday, 8 october 2013. the time, between 5:45pm and 6:00pm. the place, doha, the capital of qatar. it was getting dark. it almost was. i was in a car going on rawdat al khail street, towards doha. i was outside the city, just at the edge. there were many well lit low-rise buildings around me, and a brightly lit six-lane dual carriageway road, the one i mentioned above. straight ahead, several kilometers away, were the bright lights of the high-rise area of the city. there was a lot of traffic. i saw a plane or two take off far away, as they usually do every few minutes, and the airport was far away. suddenly, i saw 4 strange lights coming my way, as if there was a police car in the sky! it was most unnatural. i am a careful sky observer, so i know what i am looking at. aircraft lights are small, but the lights i just saw were larger, relative to aircraft lights. there were no other interfering areal objects like planes or helicopters anywhere near the lights i saw. even then i had assumed that they were plane or helicopter lights, although it did not seem so. about the lights: there were 2 green lights, both constant, and one red light which was not constant, it seemed to be moving/flashing/blinking in a clockwise manner. all 4 lights seemed to be part of a single disc. all 4 of them were like quadrants of the disc. the entire ufo was a single one, not multiple ufos. the ufo came from the north-west. so, from my view, it came from ahead and left. both green lights of the disc occupied the left half of the disc, and the one red light kept moving from the top right position to the bottom right position in a clockwise manner and then back to the top right position and so on. i had initially assumed that it was a plane or a helicopter, due to its straight path. when it came vertically above me, almost like perpendicular, in the one or two seconds i got to observe, i could not see any wings or blades or tail (which a plane or a helicopter would have) against the dark blue sky, even after straining my eyes. this made me think it was a ufo, and remember, i am a careful sky observer. plus, i could not distinguish its skin color, but i remember it looked quite dark, almost black. this observation, too, in just one second, as it passed above me. it passed above me, then passed above the road and diagonally crossed it. by the way, it was flying quite low, hardly one or a few hundred feet above the ground. its diameter looked like it was several meters large. well, after passing above the road, it abruptly stopped in mid-air! this further convinced me that it was a ufo. that red light blinking continued on, and just as i was about to pull the cellphone to take a picture, our car sped away, and i lost sight of the object a minute or two later, as some larger buildings obstructed my view. and one more important thing: there was no sound from the ufo. well, even helicopters can stop in mid-air, but if one would fly so low, it would have made a considerable amount of noise. planes don't stop in mid-air, and helicopters are definitely not circular or disc shaped with lights on their entire base. even military helicopters make some noise when flying so low. my doubts were completely cleared the next day, when my colleague told me that he too  had seen the ufo and that it went around the area for a long time. many of his friends had also seen it, he told me. i am quite convinced that it was a real ufo. as for my feelings and reactions during and after the sighting, i was really excited about it and wanted to see it again.
content.summary: 2 green lights and 1 red, red flashing twice on one half of disc in clockwise manner. that light once changes to next clockwise position, then back to 1st pos. ufo flew over our car&road, then stopped abruptly&hovered

content.detailedDescription:
As a homemaker i was startled to hear the warning from my nearest nike site scrambling all personnel to report to base. we watched this disc flying hoovering over the buildings in downtown seattle on king tv.My husband reported as ordered and i watched tv knowing all missles were loaded and aimed at seattle.Hours went by. jets from nearby air bases were deployed and attempting to subdue it. the disc which we all believed to be  a ufo. we were on high alert but it couldn;t be caught. pretty soon tv was dead and even though we were still on red alert went on and we did not get an all clear till the following day, at which time all military 
personnel and their families were told it was nothing! we saw nothing!!
it didn;t ever happen!!! not many people on bainbridge island or poulsbo even had telephones and tv;s which made a cover-up very easy.
content.summary: Ufo over downtown seattle, scrambled all military bases to red alert

content.detailedDescription: June 2011, myrtle beach sc. 21:00 to 22:00 i believe the time was. the night was in the last week in june 2011, can't remember the day. i was sitting on the deck during my vacation week looking at the ocean, night time and seen a few stars, some clouds. instantly i witness an object blink on high above the ocean, at least 1/2 mile to a mile up.  this object was very bright, it blinked on for 60-80 seconds without moving. i'd say it was the size of a very bright star but bigger, much bigger, it was not pulsating,, just a bright lite. it then blinked off, about 2 minutes later the same thing happened, no motion whats so ever. this object did this three times i believe. i did not see any other objects, planes or choppers. this could not of been a military chopper or plane, i've seen choppers hover over the oceans during my military career, this was nothing like that and it was way to high to be searching for subs, to close to the coast i believe. i've never seen anything like this, a few years later i read a magazine and read a story about people seeing the same thing and objects,, i was like wow, this is crazy. i asked myself this question, did i see something unexplanable ?  i'll never forget it.
content.summary: Orb lit up between 9pm 10pm, i believe over ocean for 1 minute blinked on then came on up the coast. no movement

content.detailedDescription:
Was on back porch. i saw lights coming through the trees to southwest (approx. somers, wisc.) 

thought the first few were helicopters, but more appeared and all moved above the trees. no sounds of engines. they glowed red. no flashing lights or strobes.

 counted twelve in a group, with two more trailing behind. all were of same uniform size, shape and color. they were not aligned in any pattern or formation and each round red glowing orb looked separate from the others.

 objects moved to the northwest at about the same speed expected from a small plane. no fast or erratic movements. the objects were unevenly spaced and all moving in same direction in what looked like a loose group. two more trailed behind the larger group.

red light disappeared once they passed a point to the west, like a headlight would not be visible once it is turned away from viewer.

 i called two more witnesses out to see the event. none of us could identify what these round red lights were. we do have a lot of aircraft traffic here, there were planes visible in sky before, during and after sighting. we felt sure these were not planes or helicopters. watched objects until lights were no longer visible as they moved due west. total of about 4 minutes lapsed.
content.summary: Ten red orbs sighted to the sw over somers, with two trailing behind

content.detailedDescription:
On july 2011 while sitting in the back yard clear sky's minimal cloud cover, i noticed a flash out the corner of my eye towards the northwest, when my spouse advised me to look towards the northwest because of a light that she observed that shot down from the sky. at first i thought it was a plane as it was coming our way! then i noticed that it was pulsating in a red orange manor moving slow about 4 to 5 hundred feet above the ground heading southeast making no nose and i realized it was not a plane or a helicopter. then my spouse advised me of another object of the same nature that shot down from the same direction as the first one did and proceeded on the same flight path as the first object.
upon observing them i got very curious, we saw these objects maintaining a level height moving above our home towards kirkland air force base se. then observed the two objects ascending upwards in a high rate of speed until out of sight! at that point because my spouse and i had watched these objects with both of us ending up in the front yard! i looked towards the northwest and noticed several more of the same objects shooting down stopping and start moving laterally towards us at the same flight path as the first two, a total of nine objects where observed, i contact the albuquerque police dept. to see if these objects where being reported and was advised that no other reports had been called in, they gave me a number to call which was the number to the air traffic control on the air base to see if they could give us info on the sightings. upon calling and talking to the controller and giving him a description of what we where observing, he said they may be air force jets taking off and i advised him that these where not jets! or any type of aircraft i know of, and i advised him that these objects where headed his direction, as i was on the phone with him, and he advised that he had no visual on any objects coming his way of which i just could not believe because we where fallowing these objects as they headed the direction of the air base and went strait up!! we where perplexed at what we saw it was very bizarre! to say the least, we could not believe what we had just observed, the whole event took about 20 mins. these objects where on a flight path no question about it, they look like a barrel shaped object's that glowed and pulsated in orange red they looked to have been about maybe the size of a bus with a whitish light on the bottom part!. the albuquerque police contacted me at around 11:45 to advised me that a police office observed the objects and thought them to be flairs? and as i spoke to the dispatch person, i advised that flairs don't fly across the terrain on a flight path then go up! into the sky!! and she didn't know how to reply and noted that other people had called in on the objects!. i don't know if these were military, or skunk works air craft or what but these object moved without sound and moved weird and shot up into the sky! flairs don't do that!!! this was very unbelievable as my spouse and i looked at each other with disbelief. i have held back cause no one will believe you and you know your going to get laughed at if you bring it to light! i saw your program on tv and thought i would share this with you for what it's worth, but very accurate none the less as to what we saw. thank you joe macias
content.summary: My spouse and i observed 9 objects that came down from the sky! moved sw to se at a slow pace orange red pulsating no sound then went upwards and despaired

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to meet some friends for our usual thursday night beer(s).  
  
i left my place at roughly 7:15 and arrived at the bus stop about 2 minutes later. the bus was scheduled to stop there at 7:22
as i crossed the street i noticed there were 3 people waiting for the bus, 1 to the south of the stop and 2 inside the shelter, even though the sky was clear that evening. what first caught my attention were 3 lights which initially i thought were spotlights for the tennis stadium.
the lights seemed to be hovering, still, and very much aligned. 
for a second i pondered maybe some celestial alignment, but these were no planets, in my humble opinion. 
i knew i had a dilemma on my hands, as more people gathered at the bustop;
do i miss my bus to stare at these odd lights which could end up to just be planes or helicopters?  i watched for a minute or two and eventually the light furthest away turned to the right. the other 2 lights seemed to be flickering a bit more at this point, although their flickers all throughout were very subtle.  i could see the bus approaching and decided to hop on.  i gazed back at the lights as long as i could.  they were still there as the bus took me downtown.
i should also note that i could see other planes flying, one seemingly behind them ( seemed far away and had a blinking (blue) light, going the same direction from south to north as the furthest light also did.  i live just below the flight path so constant planes flying overhead not far from the bus stop.  
i regret not taking any photos or videos, i don't know why it didn't occur to me to do so at the time. maybe it's because don't have a fancy i phone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 lights hovering ,seemingly aligned , eventually the light furtheset away made a right turn, and i had to catch my bus

content.detailedDescription:
At about 8 p.M on october 10, 2013 my husband, his sister and her partner were star gazing on our deck.  they called me out.  a steady, bright white light to the south was moving from west to east in a straight line.  after about 2 minutes it faded, got smaller and disappeared.  after about 5 minutes the same light or another similar light appeared to the southwest moving east.  it, too, faded, got smaller and disappeared.

i knew this wasn't a plane or satellite because it was too bright and there was no blinking.

after i saw the light, i watched it steadily in case it suddenly vanished or turned or changed in any way.  

while outside we saw two satellits and several jets.  all of these appeared smaller than the lights we saw and farther up.
content.summary: Saw steady, bright white light in the south moving west to east in straight line.  after about 2 minutes it faded, got smaller and disappeared.  after 5 minutes another or same light appeared and did the same.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my buddy was setting in my swing watching the sky and having a beer. i saw a star ? then i said my eyes messing with me or is that star moving, then it drifted north so then we knew it was moving it traveled toward us then curved to the north east went behind trees. my buddy the jet pilot was using binoculars he said that no plane he knows of. it looked round and bright white light after it turned north the shape and light did not change. you tell us what did we see you are the experts.
content.summary: Bright light flying west to east then turned north east. my buddy flys anything with wings even he said that is no plane he knows of.
